column4: A capacitive boost module, and a two-channel audio power amplifier with continuous output power of 6.5W and NCN. Features include Class AB and Class D switching, 4 NCN options, dynamic current limiting between 1.4A and 3A, adaptive adjustment and adaptive boost, Charge_pump boosted to 6.6V, Class D output power of －5.5W (VDD=4.2V, RL =4Ω, AGC OFF THD+N=10%) and －6.5W (VDD=4.2V, RL =3Ω, AGC OFF THD+N=10%), OCP, OTP and UVLO protection, and ESOP10. Applications include microphones, portable speakers/card speakers, Bluetooth speakers/AI speakers.
